    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AcceptOrDeclineScreen
    The AcceptOrDeclineScreen screen for a doctor to accept or decline appointments.
    Administrator
    The Administrator class represents an administrator role in the hospital management system.
    AdministratorScreen
    The AdministratorScreen represents the screen for the administrator role, allowing management of various functionalities including notifications, user management, appointments, and medication inventory.
    AdminViewAndManageMedicationScreen
    The AdminViewAndManageMedicationScreen is a screen for viewing and managing medication stocks in the inventory.
    AnsiColor
    Color code for ansi color See: Color Codes
    ApplicationHandle
     
    Appointment
    The Appointment class represents an appointment within the system, detailing information about the patient, doctor, status, date, and time of the appointment.
    AppointmentManager
    The AppointmentManager class manages appointment scheduling, updating, and cancellation within the system.
    AppointmentManagerHolder
     
    AppointmentOutcomeRecord
    The AppointmentOutcomeRecord class represents the outcome of a patient's appointment.
    AppointmentOutcomeRecordView
    The AppointmentOutcomeRecordView displays the outcome record of an appointment, encapsulating details such as doctor and patient information, appointment date, service type, prescribed medications, consultation notes, and medication status.
    AppointmentScreen
    The AppointmentScreen class represents a screen where doctors can manage their appointments, including accepting or declining appointments, recording consultation notes, and viewing detailed information.
    AppointmentService
    The AppointmentService enum represents the types of services available for an appointment within the system.
    AppointmentStatus
    The AppointmentStatus enum represents the various stages of an appointment within the system.
    AppointmentStatusRenderer
    The AppointmentStatusRenderer is a renderer for displaying appointment status information.
    AppointmentView
    The AppointmentView class represents a view of an appointment It extends the Appointment class and implements the EventInterface.
    AppointmentView
    The AppointmentView class represents a simplified view of an appointment's outcome, including details about the doctor, patient, consultation notes, and medication status.
    AppointmentViewLM
    The AppointmentViewLM class provides a lightweight view of an appointment, displaying essential information such as the appointment ID, doctor name, patient name, and appointment status.
    Availability
    The Availability class represents a doctor's available appointment slot, including the date and start and end times.
    AvailabilityManager
    The AvailabilityManager class manages doctor availability slots in the system.
    AvailabilityManagerHolder
     
    AvailabilityStatus
     
    BloodType
    The BloodType enum represents the different blood types, including positive and negative variations of types A, B, O, and AB.
    CalendarScreen<Event,Collection>
    The CalendarScreen display a navigable calendar on to the console.
    CancelAppointmentScreen
    The CancelAppointmentScreen class allows view and cancel scheduled appointments.
    CareProvider
    The CareProvider class manages the relationships between patients and doctors, allowing for bidirectional mapping between the two.
    CareProviderHolder
     
    consoleapi_h
     
    ConsoleColor
    Console Color use for setting the current color printed by the console implementation.
    ConsoleInputFormatException
    Exception thrown to indicate that the format of the console input is invalid.
    ConsoleInputNotFoundException
    Exception thrown to indicate that the specified console input could not be found.
    ConsoleInterface
    ConsoleInterface defines methods for interacting with a console.
    CSVReader
    The CSVReader class extends BufferedReader and provides functionality to read CSV (Comma-Separated Values) files line by line.
    Database
    The Database class is a utility for resetting and populating the database with sample data.
    DateRenderer
    The DateRenderer class allows the PaginationTableScreen to show the LocalDate in a pretty formatted string of
    DateTimeRenderer
    The DateTimeRenderer class allows the PaginationTableScreen to show the LocalDateTime, LocalDate, LocalTime in a pretty formatted string of
    DateUtils
    Utility class for date-related operations.
    Doctor
    The Doctor class represents a doctor role in the hospital management system.
    DoctorAvailabilityScreen
    The DoctorAvailabilityScreen manages a doctor's availability in a calendar-like view.
    DoctorConfigurationScreen
    The DoctorConfigurationScreen allows a doctor to manage their account settings, including changing their password.
    DoctorScreen
    The DoctorScreen class provides a menu interface for doctors to manage their operations, such as viewing patient records and personal schedules.
    errno_h
     
    EventInterface
    EventInterface defines methods for accessing and displaying event details which will be used by the CalendarScreen.
    FFMConsoleInterface
    The FFMConsoleInterface provides an interactive console for interacting with the application
    FieldRenderer<T>
    The FieldRenderer class allow the PaginationTableScreen to display custom field with different type
    Gender
    The Gender enum represents the gender of a user within the hospital management system.
    HeaderField
    Annotation to customize the display of fields in the PaginationTableScreen.
    HMS
    The HMS class serves as the entry point for the Hospital Management System application.
    InteractiveConsoleInterface
     
    InvalidStaffRoleException
    The InvalidStaffRoleException is a custom runtime exception that is thrown when an invalid staff role is encountered in the system.
    InventoryManager
    The InventoryManager class manages the medication inventory for the system, including medication stock levels and replenishment requests.
    InventoryManagerHolder
     
    LoginManager
    LoginManager provides authentication management for users, including login, logout, and user account management.
    LoginManagerHolder
    The LoginManagerHolder class implements the Singleton pattern to manage a single instance of LoginManager.
    LoginScreen
    The login screen for the application.
    LogoutScreen
    The LogoutScreen class provides a screen for users to log out.
    LowStockIndicatorRenderer
    The LowStockIndicatorRenderer is a renderer for indicating the stock status of medications.
    MacOsTerminal
     
    MainScreen
    The main screen of the Hospital Management System (HMS).
    MedicalRecord
    The MedicalRecord class represents a patient's medical record, including details such as date of birth and blood type.
    MedicalRecordScreen
    The MedicalRecordScreen class displays the patient's personal information and medical records.
    Medication
    The Medication class represents a medication with a specified name.
    MedicationRenderer
    The MedicationRenderer is a renderer for displaying medication information.
    MedicationStatus
    The MedicationStatus enum represents the status of a medication order within the system.
    MedicationStock
    The MedicationStock class represents the stock details of a medication, including the current stock level and the minimum stock level before restocking is needed.
    MedicationStockCSVReader
    The MedicationStockCSVReader class is responsible for reading medication stock data from a CSV file and converting it into a list of MedicationStock objects.
    MultiStorageProvider<K,T>
    An interface for managing multiple storage providers.
    Notification
    The Notification class represents a notification within the system.
    NotificationInterface
    The NotificationInterface provides methods for creating, dismissing, and retrieving notifications associated with users in the system.
    NotificationManager
    The NotificationManager class implements the NotificationInterface and provides methods to create, dismiss, and retrieve notifications associated with users in the system.
    NotificationManagerHolder
    The NotificationManagerHolder class implements the Singleton pattern to provide a single, global instance of NotificationManager.
    NotificationScreen
    The NotificationScreen class displays notifications for the currently logged-in user in a paginated table format.
    NumberUtils
     
    Operation
     
    Option
    Represents an option in a console interface.
    OptionAlreadyExistsException
    Exception thrown to indicate that an option with the given ID already exists
    OptionNotAvailableToBeRemoveException
    Exception thrown when an attempt is made to remove an option that is not available.
    OptionScreen
    Option screen extends Screen with selectable options.
    OptionsUtils
     
    OSUtils
    A utility class for checking the operating system type.
    PaginationTableScreen<T>
    PaginationTableScreen provides a reusable component to display and manage tables with pagination functionality in a console-based UI.
    PasswordUtils
    The PasswordUtils class provides utility methods for handling password-related operations, including generating UUIDs, hashing passwords, and verifying password complexity.
    PastOutcomeRecordsScreen
    The PastOutcomeRecordScreen class displays a list of past appointment outcome for the patient.
    Patient
    The Patient class represents a patient in the hospital management system.
    PatientConfigurationScreen
    The PatientConfigurationScreen class represents the screen where a patient can edit their non-medical personal information, including password, email and phone number.
    PatientDataView
    The PatientDataView class represents the storage of a patient's personal information data for display purpose.
    PatientMedicalRecordDataView
    The PatientMedicalRecordDataView class consolidate patient's personal information from Patient and past medical records from the AppointmentOutcomeRecord, providing a structured format for east access.
    PatientMedicalRecordsScreen
    The PatientMedicalRecordsScreen class displays a paginated view of patient medical records for the currently logged-in doctor.
    PatientScreen
    The PatientScreen class represents the main interface for patients, providing options It extends LogoutScreen to let this screen inherits the attributes of logout Patients can view their medical record, edit non-medical personal information,view available appointment slots, and review past appointment outcome records.
    PatientsCSVReader
    The PatientsCSVReader class is responsible for reading patient data from a CSV file and converting it into a list of Patient objects.
    PatientView
    The PatientView class represents a view model for displaying patient information.
    Pharmacist
    The Pharmacist class represents a pharmacist role in the hospital management system.
    PharmacistConfigurationScreen
    The PharmacistConfigurationScreen allows pharmacists to manage their configuration, including changing their password.
    PharmacistScreen
     
    PharmacistViewAndManageAppointmentOutcomeRecordScreen
    The PharmacistViewandManageAppointmentOutcomeRecordScreen allows pharmacists to view appointment outcome records.
    PharmacistViewAndManageMedicationScreen
    The PharmacistViewAndManageMedicationScreen allows pharmacists to view and manage medication stocks.
    PrescribedMedication
    The PrescribedMedication class represents a medication that has been prescribed with a specified quantity.
    PrintTableUtils
    Utility class for printing objects as tables in a console interface.
    processenv_h
     
    ReplenishmentRequest
    The ReplenishmentRequest class represents a request to replenish a specific amount of medication stock.
    ReplenishmentRequestScreen
    The ReplenishmentRequestScreen is a screen for managing replenishment requests in the inventory management system.
    ReplenishmentRequestStatus
    The ReplenishmentRequestStatus enum represents the status of a replenishment request within the system.
    RescheduleAppointmentScreen
    The RescheduleAppointmentScreen class displays a lists of patient's appointments, allowing patient to select the appointment ID that want to reschedule and book.
    Screen
    This class represent the Screen which can be display on to the ConsoleInterface
    ScreenLifeCycle
    Interface to define the lifecycle of a screen in the application.
    ScreenManager
    This class manages the navigation between various screens.
    ScreenManagerEmptyNavigationStackException
    Exception thrown when attempting to navigate back in the ScreenManager and the navigation stack is empty.
    ScreenManagerNotCreatedException
    Exception thrown when attempting to the ScreenManager is not created or references is not setup correctly by the screen manager
    SerializationMapStorageProvider<K,T>
    A storage provider that manages multiple storage providers using serialization.
    SerializationStorageProvider<T>
    A storage provider that manages a list of items and provides serialization and deserialization functionality to save and load the items from a file.
    SimpleConsoleInterface
    The SimpleConsoleInterface provides a simple console for interacting with the console with support text color and basic I/O
    SinglePaginationTableScreen<T>
    SinglePaginationTableScreen is an abstract class that extends PaginationTableScreen to provide the functionality for displaying items in a single vertical paginated table, where each item is displayed individually.
    Staff
    The Staff class is an abstract representation of staff members (Admin, Doctor, Pharmacist etc.) It extends the User class and contains common attributes and methods shared by all staff roles.
    StaffDataView
    The StaffDataView class is a representation of staff data for display purposes within the administration interface.
    StaffsCSVReader
    The StaffsCSVReader class is responsible for reading staff data from a CSV file and converting it into a list of Staff objects.
    StorageProvider<T>
    An interface for a storage provider that manages a collection of items.
    StringRenderer
    The StringRenderer class implements the FieldRenderer interface to provide functionality for rendering string values in a console interface.
    Terminal
    The Terminal class provide an os independent interface to set the console into raw mode.
    termios
    struct termios {
    tcflag_t c_iflag;
    tcflag_t c_oflag;
    tcflag_t c_cflag;
    tcflag_t c_lflag;
    cc_t c_cc[20];
    speed_t c_ispeed;
    speed_t c_ospeed;
}
    termios
    struct termios {
    tcflag_t c_iflag;
    tcflag_t c_oflag;
    tcflag_t c_cflag;
    tcflag_t c_lflag;
    cc_t c_line;
    cc_t c_cc[32];
    speed_t c_ispeed;
    speed_t c_ospeed;
}
    termios_h
     
    termios_h
     
    TextUtils
     
    TimeRenderer
    The TimeRenderer class allows the PaginationTableScreen to show the LocalTime in a pretty formatted string of
    UnixTerminal
     
    UpdateConsultationNotesScreen
    The UpdateConsultationNotesScreen class represents the screen for updating consultation notes.
    UpdatePatientMedicalScreen
    The UpdatePatientMedicalScreen class represents the screen for updating a patient's medical records.
    User
    User is an abstract class for users in the system.
    UserCreationException
    The UserCreationException class is a custom exception that is thrown when there is an error during the creation of a User object, such as when a user already exists or when password requirements are not met.
    UserInvalidPasswordException
    The UserInvalidPasswordException class is a custom exception that is thrown when a user's password does not meet the required complexity criteria, such as length and character requirements.
    UserUtils
    The UserUtils class provides utility methods for managing user creation within the administration interface of the Hospital Management System (HMS).
    UserView
    The UserView class represents a view model for a user in the Hospital Management System (HMS).
    ViewAndManageMedicationScreen
    The PharmacistViewAndManageMedicationScreen allows pharmacists to view and manage medication stocks.
    ViewAndManageUsersScreen
    The ViewAndManageUsersScreen class provides a user interface for viewing and managing users within the system It allows administrators to create, update, delete, and import user data for various roles, including patients and staff.
    ViewAvailableDoctorScreen
    The ViewAvailabledDoctorScreen class displays a calendar, allow users to navigate calendar and view available doctor appointment.
    ViewMoreDetailsAppointmentScreen
    The ViewMoreDetailsAppointmentScreen class provides an interface to view appointment details and any prescribed medications.
    ViewScheduledAppointmentsScreen
    The ViewScheduledAppointmentsScreen class displays a paginated list of the patient's scheduled appointments, allowing the patient to view their upcoming appointments.
    WindowsTerminal
